content:
Let's talk numbers...

 

â–¶ The S&P500 drop was the 5th worst since WWII.

 

â–¶ After peaking in 2022, US inflation was back under control, only to increase again in 2025.

 

â–¶ US consumers now expect the same level of unemployment as during the financial crisis.

 

â–¶ Business confidence in the US dropped again, after increasing in 2024.

 

â–¶ Weekly bankruptcy filings in the US reached the same levels of 2020, and almost the same level of 2009, at the peak of the financial crisis.

 

â–¶ There's now recession probability of 45%.

 


Not too bad ðŸ˜…
